value.title: "Thousands" of Sophia the robot units to be sold to help people cope with COVID-19
value.excerpt: The Hong Kong-based maker of Sophia the robot plans to sell thousands of units amid the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic in 2021.

value.title: Hearing aids now come with artificial intelligence. What does that mean?

value.title: 100 years later, the dystopian origin of the word ‘robot’ still rings true

value.title: Designing customized “brains” for robots
value.excerpt: MIT researchers have developed an automated way to design customized hardware that speeds up a robot’s operation. The system, called robomorphic computing, accounts for the robot’s physical layout in suggesting an optimized hardware architecture.

value.title: How to train a robot (using AI and supercomputers)

value.title: Service Robotics Market Top Trends Accentuating, Size by 2024
